channel.title: STUDY MATERIAL
channel.description: Latest updates and news for my app.

img.description:

  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 31st January Evening Shift (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 31st January Morning Shift (2024)

  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 30th January Morning Shift (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 29th January Evening Shift (2024)

item.title: Update Study Material App via Telegram
item.description: Stay up-to-date with the latest versions of the Study Material App by joining our Telegram group. Get notifications for new updates and download the app directly from our group. Click on the link to join:

item.title: NEET 2025 Syllabus
item.description: Download the official NEET 2025 syllabus to prepare for your exams. Source: nmc.org.in

item.title: Khud Pe YAKEEN - Official Song - NEET 2024 Dropper
item.description: Motivational song for NEET 2025 Dropper by Alakh Sir of Physics Wallah.

item.title: Study Material APP Update
item.description:
The latest update for the Study Material APK brings new features and improvements. Below are the details of the update and the available versions for download:

Study Material APK Update Details
Latest Version: Download Latest Version
Previous Versions:
  • Version 1 - Initial release with basic study materials
  • Version 2 - Added more features and more tests
  • Version 3 - new update
